title: Should I Leave Big Tech?
description: The foundational question that started everything.

nodes.content: I keep thinking about what I actually want to build. The PM role feels increasingly constrained.
Asked Claude about common founder motivations. The "pull vs push" framework resonated â€” I have a pull toward building, not just a push away from corporate.
David said something important: "You've been building other people's visions for 8 years. When do you build yours?"
Financial analysis: I have 18 months of runway if I'm frugal. That's enough to build and raise.
Sarah's advice: "The window for personal AI infrastructure is 18-24 months. After that, the big players will lock it down."
DECISION: I'm going to do this. Targeting March 1st as my last day.
